      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox14010586">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14010586">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14010586">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Find Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content14010586">
          <p>
           <strong>
            On this page:
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874386#14009737">
             Book Reviews
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874386#14009738">
             Film Reviews
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874386#14009739">
             Theater Reviews
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874386#14009740">
             Music Reviews
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt14010586" class="boxatt">
          </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox14009737">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009737">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009737">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Book Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009737">
          <div id="boxatt14009737" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776467">
              <a id="link_16776467" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776467,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to book reviews, choose Book Review in the Document Type menu.  Generally covers 1980s to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776473">
              <strong>
               Book Review Digest
              </strong>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               1925-current -- Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 015.73 B724d
               <br />
               1905-1924 -- Location: Microforms-Periodicals
               <br />
               A print index to selected reviewing sources, including excerpts.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776472">
              <strong>
               Book Review Index
              </strong>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 015.73 B724i
               <br />
               A print index to selected reviewing sources. Covers 1965-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776468">
              <a id="link_16776468" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776468,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to reviews, choose the News tab in the upper left corner, then Book, Movie, Music, Play, and Video Reviews from the Sources menu.  Generally covers 1980s to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776469">
              <a id="link_16776469" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776469,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to book reviews, choose Book Review in the Document Type menu.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776471">
              <strong>
               Readers' Guide to Periodical Literature
              </strong>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 051 R286g
               <br />
               A print index to selected general interest periodicals.  Generally covers 1900-1997.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776470">
              <a id="link_16776470" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776470,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12600273}); ">
               Readers' Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to book reviews, choose Book Review in the Document Type menu.  Covers 1890-1982.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009738">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009738">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009738">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Film Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009738">
          <div id="boxatt14009738" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776474">
              <a id="link_16776474" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776474,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to film reviews, choose Entertainment Review in the Document Type menu. Note that results may also include art, music, television, and theater reviews.  Generally covers 1980s to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776477">
              <strong>
               Film Review Index
              </strong>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 016.79143 F487r
               <br />
               Includes reviews of films made from 1882-1985.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776475">
              <a id="link_16776475" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776475,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369807}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to reviews, choose the News tab in the upper left corner, then Book, Movie, Music, Play, and Video Reviews from the Sources menu.  Generally covers 1980s to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776476">
              <a id="link_16776476" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776476,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to film reviews, choose Film Review in the Document Type menu.  Generally covers 1980s to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009739">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009739">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009739">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Theater Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009739">
          <div id="boxatt14009739" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776478">
              <a id="link_16776478" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776478,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to theater reviews, choose Entertainment Review in the Document Type menu. Note that results may also include art, film, music, and television reviews.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776479">
              <a id="link_16776479" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776479,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369807}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to reviews, choose the News tab in the upper left corner, then Book, Movie, Music, Play, and Video Reviews from the Sources menu.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776481">
              <strong>
               New York Times Theater Reviews
              </strong>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 792.0973 N532y
               <br />
               Theater reviews from the New York Times 1870-1994.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776480">
              <a id="link_16776480" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776480,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to theater reviews, choose Theater Review in the Document Type menu.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009740">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009740">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009740">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Music Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009740">
          <div id="boxatt14009740" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776483">
              <a id="link_16776483" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776483,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to music reviews, choose Entertainment Review in the Document Type menu. Note that results may also include art, film, performance, television, and theater reviews.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776482">
              <a id="link_16776482" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776482,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369807}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to reviews, choose the News tab in the upper left corner, then Book, Movie, Music, Play, and Video Reviews from the Sources menu.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776484">
              <a id="link_16776484" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776484,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To limit your search to music reviews, choose Sound Recording Review or Performance Review in the Document Type menu.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776485">
              <a id="link_16776485" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776485,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Reviews'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12726054}); ">
               RILM Abstract of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly and popular literature in musicology, ethnomusicology, dance, and other music-related disciplines. Includes some performance and recording reviews. Use the Document Type menu to narrow your search appropriately.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile3874386" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox14009741">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009741">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009741">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Get Help
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content13943779">
          <p>
           Need more help with this?&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/ask-a-librarian.html">
            Ask a Librarian
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <br />
           Need help with writing?&nbsp; Contact the
           <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/main/academics/writing/center/">
            Writing Center
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt13943779" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
